issue.title: [CF 498] Meta icons not using component borders r512
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
  Using a meta with 2 components, one of the components using a border with different colors according to current stacks, the other component icon has an activation border flash (Monitors legendary dagger stacks then shows the duration of the proc)

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
  The meta to show the border according to its components
  It worked like this before the last major update, now it seems to ignore them. The stacks of the first/duration of the second show correctly but not the border animations.

  I have another group similar to this that works intermittently (http://pastebin.com/5dK0rX2z)
  This one has 2 components as well- One is a continually flashing red border, the other is a 1second icon shake on a combat log event. This gives me a red-flashing Blade Flurry icon which jiggles/hides the red border for 1second every time blade flurry hits something so I can tell when its being effective.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
r512

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
group export: http://pastebin.com/eTuGFPfS
explanatory screenshot: http://imgur.com/dRj3w

Hope that this is helpful! Loving all the new changes.
